properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay north of Pooles Island MD; Patuxent River to Broomes Island MD
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 12:41PM EST until January 9 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 35 kt. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10
to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay north of Pooles Island MD and Patuxent
River to Broomes Island MD.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 6 PM EST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to midnight
EST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT
